meanings.definition: The study of modern refuse and trash as a reflection of society's values and behaviors.
meanings.sent1: Garbology helps us learn about society by looking at its trash.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use garbology to understand how people's values influence what they throw away.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd find a treasure trove in garbology class!
meanings.sent4: In the world of garbology, trash becomes a mirror reflecting our way of life.
meanings.sent5: The professor made garbology come alive with fascinating stories about garbage.

meanings.definition: The practice of analyzing garbage to understand patterns of consumption and waste production.
meanings.sent1: Garbology helps us see how much we waste and what we consume.
meanings.sent2: By studying garbology, we can make better choices about what we throw away.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that she's a master of garbology after cleaning her room.
meanings.sent4: In the world of garbology, trash speaks volumes about our habits and lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The documentary on garbology left a lasting impression on me about our impact on the environment.
